attributes.action: Phone numbers for all manned railway stations
attributes.additional_details:
It is hugely inconvenient to the travelling public that there are no listed telephone numbers at manned railiway stations.

It should be compulsory for all train/station operators to provide an incoming  telephone number at stations to call if you have a question cocerning that station so you can speak with a real person at that station not in some remote call centre..
